/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, going about their daily routines. In the distance, a construction site hints at the city's continuous growth and development. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
